titles.title: A resolution recognizing and supporting the goals and ideals of National Runaway Prevention Month.
A resolution recognizing and supporting the goals and ideals of National Runaway Prevention Month.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes and supports the goals and ideals of National Runaway Prevention Month.
